<< fix elementary functions flipdim >>

flip

Flip order of elements

Syntax

B = flip(A, dim)

Input argument

A

an array

dim

an positive integer value

Output argument

B

flipped array.

Description

flip return an new array of A flipped about the dimension dim.

Example

x = eye(3, 2);
y = flip(x, 1)
y = flip(x, 2)
y = flip(x, 3)

See also

flipud, fliplr, flipdim.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
